If you have a macbook...good luck, I've been playing Counterstrike for 17 years, but fuck, I've never seen a smooth game on any Apple, so I stop playing for months and come back every now and then just to get pissed off by the jitter, lag, frame drops etc.

Yeah I have pc's too, but I'm lazy

*Update on this, recently Feb2020, I found this APPLE USERS

-high -novid -nod3d9ex -freq 60 -refresh cl_forcepreload 1 -nojoy +fps_max 60 -tickrate 128 -no-browser

set in launch options, thank yourself later!  Game runs like never before

10 out of 10 games have cheaters. All 10! Only one cons. My rank has slipped into the abyss. VAC does not react to reports in any way, although they are blocked up by them! Why do not they annul the games in which there were cheaters, after their identification ?! Why should honest players suffer from underdeveloped defenses and their creatures ?! Few reports come from honest players ?! At least 5, or even more! Why there is no instant check after numerous complaints in 1 game. 10 of 10! Why did I pay Valve $ 10 ?! For regular stress !? 0, no more! Only due to the lack of an adequate solution to the problem. Take an example from the developers of DotA, a few reports from players lead to a ban. Now cheaters do not stop anything before the destruction of games and most importantly the ranks. I have been playing Cs for 7 years. All 7 years the main problem of the players is cheaters. Make a rating selection of the game after 20 levels for accounts without prime, this will greatly reduce the number of cheaters. Now they need to play 2-3 hours and they can already destroy the ranks of other players. Valve just fuck!
